attributes.action: Make Portugal Police agree to letting in British Dogs before its too late to Trace Scent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to the press Portugal Policing has refused to let British Dogs Cover the area where Madeleine went missing as they are able to recover scents up to 28 days and we are nearing on this deadline.  Please can we have some forceful action via Priminister to get this overrun and get our trained dogs which I beleive to be on standby in Portugal and looking before Thursday

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
